testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to update the status information of registered withdrawal methods through the API connection.
testcase.name: When invalid authorization information and a PATCH body containing the 'id' are sent
testcase.system-out: Given The API user sets "api/withdraw/methods/status/23" path parameters....passed Then The API user records the response from the api withdraw methods status endpoint with invalid authorization information verifies that the status code is '401' and confirms that the error message is Unauthorized.passed
